Frequently Asked Questions

How do I book a tour?+

Simply visit our Tours page, select your preferred tour, and click "Book Now". Fill in your details on the booking form and we'll confirm your reservation within 24 hours.

What is your cancellation policy?+

We offer free cancellations up to 30 days before your tour. Cancellations within 30 days may incur a fee. For details, please contact our team.

Are your tours suitable for families?+

Yes! Many of our tours are family-friendly. We recommend checking individual tour details or contacting us for recommendations based on your family's needs.

What is included in the tour price?+

Our tour prices include accommodation, all meals, transportation within the tour area, entrance fees, and an expert guide. Flights to/from Namibia are not included.
